thread.title: Britain will be hotter than Greece as temperatures hit 17C
thread.title_full: Britain will be hotter than Greece as temperatures hit 17C

title: Britain will be hotter than Greece as temperatures hit 17C
text: It's ALREADY the hottest day of the year! Britain is set to be warmer than Greece as balmy Caribbean air sends temperatures rising to 17C (but winter will come crashing back in tomorrow) Surprisingly mild temperatures come just one week after snowfall on the south coast Temperatures will hit 17C but most parts of UK will be beneath cloudy, drizzly skies all day Fleeting glimpse of spring set to be blown away by 50mph winds and rain later this week Respite from winter is thanks to high pressure pushing jet stream further north than usual
